p: We applied county-level age-stratified all-cause death rates from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention for the years 2012â€“2014 [ 62]. Using a national-level life table projected to the year 2060, provided by the U.S. Census Bureau, we projected the death rates to the year 2060. We assume that the death rates are held constant between the years 2060 and 2090.
